com.hush.pgp.io.packets
Class PacketContentOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      com.hush.pgp.io.packets.PacketContentOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
PgpConstants, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompressedDataOutputStream, LiteralDataOutputStream, OnePassSignatureOutputStream, PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyOutputStream, PublicKeyOutputStream, SignatureOutputStream, SymmetricallyEncryptedDataOutputStream, SymmetricKeyEncryptedSessionKeyOutputStream, TrustOutputStream, UserIDOutputStream
public abstract class PacketContentOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
implements PgpConstants

A stream to write the content of a PGP packet. It's sole purpose is to provide an interface for initialization of the data to be written to the packet.

setLength

public void setLength(long length)
Sets the length of the packet. Cannot be called after data is written to the stream.

Parameters:
length - the packet length.
